definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: Please fit a new tire to the CAR.
sentences.chinese: 请给这辆车装一个新轮胎。

sentences.english: This kind of tyre is characteristic of nonskid stops on wet roads.
sentences.chinese: 这种轮胎的特点是在潮湿路面上不打滑。

sentences.english: Introduce:Nylon tyre cord fabric, motorcycles, napkin machine, bearings.
sentences.chinese: 轮胎永帘子布，摩托车，柔巾机，轴承。

sentences.english: The compound formulation for calendered belt of steel- belted radial tire was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 试验研究半钢子午线轮胎压延法带束层胶配方。

sentences.english: The wear-out of plane tyres is serious and should be replaced periodically.
sentences.chinese: 由于飞机轮胎磨损快，要求经常更换。

sentences.english: KR: It is getting better all the time but it takes time to get used to it.
sentences.chinese: 普利斯通轮胎一直都在改进，但是要适应它需要时间。

sentences.english: Tire crane is a type of crane.
sentences.chinese: 轮胎式起重机是起重机的一种类型。

sentences.english: The 'softness' or 'hardness' of rubber compounds is varied for each race according to the known characteristics of the track.
sentences.chinese: 根据各赛道不同的特性，轮胎橡胶的硬度也不相同。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a rubber tube tyre jointly born by a tyre tube and a tyre cover.
sentences.chinese: 本发明是一种内外胎联合承载的胶管轮胎。

sentences.english: Take a spare tire along in case of need.
sentences.chinese: 翻译你的汽车上有备用轮胎吗？

sentences.english: Cheng. He expects a shortage of TBR tires won't end any time soon.
sentences.chinese: 他预计TBR轮胎短缺的局面近期内不会结束。

sentences.english: Once the tire failure, accompanied the spare tire will come in handy.
sentences.chinese: 一旦轮胎发生故障，随车携带的备胎就可派上用场。

sentences.english: He saw a dagger sticking in his car's tyre.
sentences.chinese: 他看到一把匕首插在他汽车的轮胎上。

sentences.english: Is China not pushing its tires here?
sentences.chinese: 中国是否没有在这里推动轮胎？

definition: to brake (when driving)/to stop/to switch off/to check (bad habits)/a brake
